original_text:
the Lord gives sight to the blind,
the Lord lifts up those who are bowed down,
    the Lord loves the righteous.
korean_text: 여호와께서 맹인들의 눈을 여시며 여호와께서 비굴한 자들을 일으키시며 여호와께서 의인들을 사랑하시며

sentences.original_text: the Lord gives sight to the blind
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 소경에게 볼 수 있게 하시고

sentences.original_text: the Lord lifts up those who are bowed down
